title: Georgia House - Day 40 (2026-04-04)
summary:
## Georgia House - Day 40 PM Session Part 2 (April 4, 2026)

### Overview
Late evening session completing the final day (Sine Die) of the 2026 Georgia legislative session.

### Key Actions
- Final passage of remaining conference committee reports
- Last-minute amendments and bill reconciliations
- Closing speeches and recognitions
- Sine Die adjournment proceedings

### Sine Die Traditions
- Final recognitions of departing members
- Thank you speeches to staff and leadership
- Ceremonial closing of the session

### Session Characteristics
- Extended session pushing toward midnight deadline
- Historic legislation finalized
- 2026 session officially concluded

### Notes
- Marks end of 40-day legislative session
- Members return to districts until next session
